data.actual_result: The text field is greatly expanded, being several lines tall if the Channel's name is very long
data.expected_result: The Channel's name truncates with "..." to prevent the text field expansion (like on desktop)
data.short_description: Text field expands several lines tall if the Channel has a long name
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a Channel with a long name (can use the full 100 char limit or just some wide characters like "w") and observe the text field's length
